description: Survey course introducing students to the breadth of bioengineering. Course consists of weekly guest lectures and a series of small projects and reports that allow students to explore different facets of bioengineering.
name: INTRO TO BIOENGINEERING

values.comments: Students generally found the class to be a good introductory course; however, many felt that the grading was too subjective given that there were multiple TA’s with different grading guidelines and time deadlines. Additionally, students found that, at times, the readings from the text and lectures were too abstract and hard to follow.
